name: UIFontMetrics
desc: A utility object for obtaining custom fonts that scale to support Dynamic Type.

items.name: init(forTextStyle: UIFont.TextStyle)
items.desc: Creates a font metrics object for the specified text style.

items.name: class var `default`: UIFontMetrics
items.desc: The default font metrics object for content.

items.name: struct UIFont.TextStyle
items.desc: Constants that describe the preferred styles for fonts.

items.name: func scaledFont(for: UIFont) -> UIFont
items.desc: Returns a version of the specified font that adopts the current font metrics.

items.name: func scaledFont(for: UIFont, compatibleWith: UITraitCollection?) -> UIFont
items.desc: Returns a version of the specified font that adopts the current font metrics and supports the specified traits.

items.name: func scaledFont(for: UIFont, maximumPointSize: CGFloat) -> UIFont
items.desc: Returns a version of the specified font that adopts the current font metrics and is constrained to the specified maximum size.

items.name: func scaledFont(for: UIFont, maximumPointSize: CGFloat, compatibleWith: UITraitCollection?) -> UIFont
items.desc: Returns a version of the specified font that adopts the current font metrics and is constrained to the specified traits and size.

items.name: func scaledValue(for: CGFloat) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Scales an arbitrary layout value based on the current Dynamic Type settings.

items.name: func scaledValue(for: CGFloat, compatibleWith: UITraitCollection?) -> CGFloat
